import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipAccountApproaches from '../../_admonitions/_tip-account-approaches.md';

As your application may handle many accounts or addresses, the IOTA SDK provides a convenient function to list
all of the [`Accounts`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md) related to a wallet,
[`wallet.getAccounts()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#getaccounts).

This allows you to provide accurate and up-to-date information to your users, such as the account name, balance,
transaction history, and other relevant metadata, facilitating seamless management of multiple accounts within your
platform.

<TipAccountApproaches />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html).
2. Call the [`Wallet.get_accounts()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.get_accounts)
   function to retrieve all the [`Accounts`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md) related to the wallet.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_accounts.rs#L28-L30
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md).
2. Call the [`Wallet.getAccounts()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#getaccounts)
   function to retrieve all the [`Accounts`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md) related to the wallet.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list-accounts.ts#L25-L28
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md).
2. Call the [`Wallet.get_accounts()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#get_accounts)
   function to retrieve all the [`Accounts`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md) related to the wallet.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_accounts.py#L15-L16
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
